name: Sid Meier's Civilization: Beyond Earth - Rising Tide
name_original: Sid Meier's Civilization: Beyond Earth - Rising Tide
description:
Sid Meier's Civilization: Beyond Earth - Rising Tide is a strategy game developed by Firaxis. It was originally released in 2015. 2K Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Sid Meier's Civilization: Beyond Earth - Rising Tide on PC.
